text: Very helpful when I need extra cash,but I think its a bit ridiculous to have to leave a tip every single time I borrow the money,since it only lets you borrow 50 at a time. Most of the time when I do borrow its 150, so im repaying the 150,the 3.99 charge to get it instantly and a few more dollars everytime for a tip,and I leave a tip,but not every single time i get the money.
title: Very helpful when I need extra cash,but…

reply.message: Hi there, Courtney! Thank you so much for this awesome review and feedback! We want to inform you that with 0% APR InstaCash, you can spot yourself some cash anytime. How soon you can get your funds depends on the delivery method you choose and whether you're sending the funds to your RoarMoney account. We offer turbo delivery options to your RoarMoney or external account for a small fee of $3.99 - $4.99 so that you may receive your funds instantly. Alternatively, we offer free delivery options within 24-48 hours to your RoarMoney account or 3-5 business days to an external account. Additionally, tips are absolutely optional and do not impact eligibility or availability, however, we encourage you to support the community and we highly appreciate it! You see, it takes a big team here at MoneyLion to keep 0% APR Instacash running smoothly 24/7. Your tips are what help us cover the high costs of administering Instacash at 0% APR for the large and growing MoneyLion community. Given you’ve expressed a positive experience with MoneyLion, would you be open to also sharing this review on other review sites, including Google Play, Apple Store, BBB, and Wallethub? Thanks again for being the best part of MoneyLion!

text: I love using money lion but there are some things that I’m not happy with. When I first joined I had the black money lion debit card only a few months into having my account I was sent the roar money debit card and was told I had no choice but to switch NOT COOL!!!!! Again I love this company and the fact that you can build your credit what I don’t like is that if you use instacash you get robbed money because of all the fees and a tip that you must agree to before you can borrow the money say you are approved to borrow $200 you have to make multiple transactions to get the $200 and you are charged a ridiculous fee and tip for every transaction!!!! NOT COOL!!
title: It needs work!

reply.message:
Hi Robin,
Instacash funding is FREE if you choose standard delivery, which takes only 24-48 hours. If you need your Instacash extra fast, you can choose instant Turbo funding for $4.99 (or $3.99 if you have our RoarMoney bank account). The Turbo fee is totally optional and just helps us cover the cost of delivering your cash advance instantly when you’re in a pinch.We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

text: High interest rates. Poor customer service. I initiated a transfer from my investment account and it said there was a technical problem and their engineers were working on it. Then I was able to continue with the transfer but unsurprisingly they haven’t sold my shares and the money is just sitting there. It’s not much but I figured they just want to keep it for themselves. Another greedy service. Beware and stay away!!! After I’m paying my loan that’s it for me. Bye!!

text: I like this, but I don’t like that I can only get $50 at a time. So everytime I borrow I am charged an extra $5 fee plus a tip(optional). The money that’s owed back adds up quickly. So if I wanted to borrow $150 I would even up paying back $150 plus an extra $15 plus whatever tip I decided to pay. That’s a bit much.
title: It’s alright.

reply.message: We're sorry to hear about your experience with MoneyLion. We created Instacash to help you access extra money to cover everyday essentials and unexpected expenses, and we designed it to be easy to pay back. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash in increments of $50 or less. Of course, if you’ve unlocked an Instacash limit higher than $50, it will all still be available to you if you need it. You’ll just have to take it out in advances of $50 at a time. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly!
